resources.string:
Steps to Follow

ONE: Click the take Picture button in the bright yellow color is clicked yes to allow the app be able to use the camera

TWO: Click the take picture button in the bright yellow color to open your camera and click the camera button to snap

THREE: Click ok after the image is captured then watch the magic
Welcome to Application for the visually impaired people. To detect the currency with high accuracy , place the note over a flat surface with good lighting and scan it using the camera.
